Entries.DialogueText: What's this... 'Woody's Secret'? ... Um, what kind of book is this, ?
Oh, it's about woodcutting! Hahaha... Oh yeah, I'm going to love this. Thanks!
Ah, 'Woodcutter's Weekly'... I was hoping to get my hands on the newest issue! They've got all the latest techniques in here!
From one woodcutter to another... Thank you.
Wait a sec... you're giving me this? What a special treat! Thank you.
Hey! I heard that Lewis showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Hey! I heard some weird noises last night, and woke up this morning to find the quarry bridge completely repaired!
It's a miracle of woodworking!
I knew it from the moment you stepped off that bus, ... you were destined to be a town hero!
Maru was crying through the night... We're all devastated...
Sebastian's back in the basement... what happened between you two?
Great, then this blueprint should be a piece of cake for you!
Well, then I have the perfect blueprint to get you started!
Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?
I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
Maru likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.
So how are you and Maru getting along?
You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't in the market for a building upgrade!
It can get pretty lonely up here in the mountains.
You've met my son Sebastian, right? He lives downstairs.
He's a little shy, but I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
I miss my Sebby... he was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in him.
I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?
Sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...
I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
Sebastian told me he's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of him.
That man is insane! Why does he have to go out there? We have no idea if this rain is dangerous!
There's all kinds of good wood out there today. Better get chopping, huh?
I hope Demetrius is happy with the 'samples' he collected. Seems like his little science project is more important to him than his own wife. Hmmph.
It was fun working on your house. That might be some of the finest construction I've ever done!
I hope you're enjoying the new kitchen.
What are you going to do with all that new space in your house?
Or perhaps I should call it... your 'mansion'?
So, are you getting into the aged wine business? I've heard it's very lucrative... if you have the patience.
Have you met everyone in town yet? That sounds exhausting.
We'll all miss having Maru around the house, but I'm sure we'll still see her often!
Oh, don't worry... these are tears of joy. I know Sebastian will be very happy on Farm!
Have I told you that I built our house from the ground up?
It's definitely been the highlight of my career so far.
Ooh... Two tickets for tonight's show, huh? Sounds good! I'll meet you there.
Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and Penny seem really happy.
Veggie salt? Sounds good, but I don't need it.
Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe show this to her?
Wow, look at these structures!
I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!
This is so relaxing...
Hey . You know, I was just thinking about how far the town has come since you first moved here.
You should really be proud of all you've done!
That was fun!
Hey, look! I can see another island from here.
Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?
I love the fresh air of the mountains.
Are you satisfied with the new barn? I'm sure you'll raise some very happy livestock in there!
That's probably the sturdiest coop I've ever built. Hope you get a lot of use out of it!
How's that new coop treatin' ya? I'll be excited to meet your new animals!
I mentioned to Willy that you got a new fish pond. He seemed really happy about it.
Apparently, he raised crabs when he was a young man. Called it a 'time-honored tradition'.
So, what are your plans with the new shed? The possibilities are endless!
*phew*... Building that slime hutch was a lot of work... I'll need a day at the spa to recuperate!
So, have you been riding your new horse around town?
I imagine you're pretty sore, but you'll get used to it soon.
We're pretty insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.
It has its pros and cons.
Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has its own unique character!
If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!
You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.
But I'm sure you'll be pleased with the results!
I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of his.
I'm not even sure what he's working on. I think it has something to do with plants.

My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.
Sorry if it smells weird in here, . It's my husband's bizarre science project...
Hi ! It's good to see you.
You're a regular member of the community now, don't you think?
You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't shopping, you know.
Hey, if you need any materials or blueprints, my shop is the place you're looking for!
Plus, your business supports the local economy.
Hey there, .
I was just daydreaming about some new carpentry projects.
Are you doing OK at your place? How's the woodwork in your cottage holding up?
My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.
They were pretty old-fashioned.
I think the farm life is really healthy for Sebby.
Hey, it's a perfect time of year to gather wood.
Maybe you can collect enough to upgrade your house!
Everything looks still after a fresh snow.
Hello! You must be .
I'm Robin, the local carpenter. Mayor Lewis sent me here to fetch you and show you the way to your new home. He's there right now, tidying things up for your arrival.
The farm's right over here, if you'll follow me.
This is farm.
What's the matter?
Sure, it's a bit overgrown, but there's some good soil underneath that mess!
With a little dedication you'll have it cleaned up in no time.
...And here we are, your new home.
Rustic? That's one way to put it...
'Crusty' might be a little more apt, though.
Hmmph.
Wow...
Oh... It's Linus, right?
Are you hungry? I could make you some lunch... How about some leftover cave carrot stew?
Heh... okay.
? You look like you have something to say...
That's really generous! What a great idea! I can build a real cozy house for you, Linus.
You'll finally have running water, heat, a roof over your head... just like the rest of us! Isn't that wonderful, Linus?
I guess I never thought about it that way...
Eep!
Wow!
Whaa..?
I'd like to invite Linus to live on the farm with me...
Aww.. What a sweetheart...
These eggs are so rich and yellow... Marnie, are these from your place?
Voila! My newest creation.
It's a deluxe four poster bed, crafted from the finest local hardwood.
It's called 'beauty', bud... you know, that thing that most people find enjoyable?
You know, sometimes it feels like you're being deliberately obtuse, just to irritate me. Is that what you're doing?
Hey ... Come in.
Check this out... It's the bed I was able to make thanks to all the wood you gathered.
So, what do you think?
Now that I have a prototype, I can start selling them in the shop.
Hey... these might look good in your place, ! What do you say... can we pencil you in for a half dozen?
Demetrius, I didn't tell you to get tomatoes. I said to get fruit.
When a normal person says they want fruit, they NEVER mean tomatoes. It doesn't matter what the scientific classification is.
Hi . I was just cleaning some dust off my saw.
66 null 66 50 event_wood1 66 50 event_wood2#No
I think we've become good enough friends that I can trust you with my carpentry secrets!
Here, let me show you the blueprints.
You can use these to get creative on your farm.
It feels good to be able to decorate your house with things you've made yourself!
Learned how to craft 'Flute Block' and 'Drum Block'
Oh, hi .
Sebby, I know you don't like it when I come in here... but I ran into Abigail at the store and she said she was looking for you.
I did... but she said she'd probably stop by anyway.
Um... Lewis? All you did was hold the nails.
Yeah... for example, I plan on requesting some hardwood for a bed I want to make.
I won't put you on the spot, but if you want to help me out you can just accept the job from this board.
Who knows, maybe if the bed turns out well I'll start selling them in my shop!

Entries.DialogueText: Mmmmm...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Town/191393/Hn ccFishTank/Hn ccBulletin/Hn ccPantry/Hn ccVault/Hn ccBoilerRoom/Hn ccCraftsRoom/Hl jojaFishTank/Hl jojaPantry/Hl jojaVault/Hl jojaBoilerRoom/Hl jojaCraftsRoom/Hl JojaMember/w sunny/H_alt_1
Entries.DialogueText: No More Joja!
Great use of wood!
Hey ! So... what do you think?
I feel pretty good about it...
In fact, it might be my finest work yet!
Notice the round window... very very difficult to bend the frame like that.
Oh, and the intricate carvings on the door. Took me forever. Did you notice that?
Oh... heh. I guess I'm rambling about wood again... huh?
Anyway, I'm going to go talk to them... But first I have to ask...
Okay... you stay here, then.
Hi there, neighbors... that's a nice new house you got there!
Hey, don't thank me! Someone else came up with the idea... and they paid for everything, too.
I can't say... They insisted on remaining anonymous.
Well, I wouldn't go *that* far...
Do you want me to tell them you paid for this?No, I'd rather remain anonymous
Hey Lewis... since we're funding education without touching the town's coffers, you'll be lowering our business tax, right?
It was a big success! Thanks for helping out, honey.
Okay... let's go.
Hey, don't thank me! This was 's idea... And he paid for the whole thing, too!
Hey don't thank me! This was 's idea... And she paid for the whole thing, too!
What, you didn't tell your wife about this, ?
came up with this idea and paid for the whole thing!
Thank you! I'll get started tomorrow. I should be finished in around three days.
That's so generous of you! I'll start working on the upgrade tomorrow. It should take around three days.
...I found you unconscious in the mines. I almost mistook you for a piece of exotic wood!
Be a little more careful next time, okay?
Okay, I'll start working on your {1} upgrade the day after tomorrow. I always take festivals off.
Okay, I'll start working on your {1} upgrade first thing tomorrow morning!
Okay, I'll start working on your new {0} the day after tomorrow. I always take festivals off.
Okay, I'll start working on your new {0} first thing tomorrow morning!
This {0} is pre-fabricated, so there's no construction time! Convenient, isn't it?
Woodworking is an ancient tradition that I'm very proud to be a part of.
If you want to master the wood, you have to think like a tree...
Well, winter's almost here. It's a great time to stockpile wood and stone.
Are you looking forward to things slowing down soon? Winter is around the corner.
Spring is a busy time of year... so it's nice to have a day off to catch up with friends.
It feels great to be outside again after that long, cold winter, doesn't it?
Ahh... The air smells so sweet with all these flowers.
Is that the smell of flowers? Or is it Caroline's perfume?
Ow... you stepped on my foot, dear.
Demetrius... It's because it's fun!
*yawn*... It's past my bed-time.Hey, did you see that candle-boat? I crafted it myself.
Every year, I make sure to inspect the candle-boat, and patch any holes.Imagine if it sank during the festival...
Hiya, . You're welcome to join our family table if you need company.
Welp... Husband got me a new power saw this year...He must've forgotten that he got me the same thing two years ago!
I'm sorry, but carving ice parapets requires my undivided attention!
Ice sculpting is a rewarding challenge for me. It's a distinct material that I'm not used to!
This is for me? Wow, I absolutely love it!!
Thanks! This is really nice!
Um... why?
What the...? This is terrible!
Thank you. This might come in handy.
